snippet.title: 🕷️ Malevolent Madness – Official Trailer 🕷️
snippet.description:
Are you ready to lose yourself in the darkness? Malevolent Madness is an intense FPS horror experience that blends fear, suspense, and action. Waking up with no memory, you soon realize that the nightmare is just beginning…

🔮 Mysterious artifacts, parallel dimensions, and terrifying entities await!
⚡ A gripping atmosphere, stunning visuals, and a deep narrative!
🔪 Face your fears, solve cryptic puzzles, and fight to survive!

If you want to escape this world, you must uncover the truth first…

🎮 Wishlist on Steam now! 🔗 https://rb.gy/apeily
📢 Follow us for updates:
🔹 https://www.instagram.com/nebulanovagames/
🔹 https://nebulanovagames.com/

🔥 Be prepared. The madness is coming… 🔥
